description: Documentation standards for AI agents using coderef system. Defines common practices, conventions, and patterns for agent behavior documentation (CLAUDE.md, context files, handoff protocols). Ensures consistency across all agent implementations.

references.description: Agentic process for MCP cache clearing - comprehensive example of agent process documentation with pre-flight checks, execution steps, critical rules, troubleshooting, and communication templates

notes: Reference existing mcp-cache-clearing-process.json as example of agent process standards. Should define similar patterns for: CLAUDE.md structure, context.json format, handoff protocol templates, communication.json status flow, agent behavior documentation
